member.name: T:CMS.SynchronizationEngine.BaseIntegrationConnector
member.summary: Class that needs to be inherited during implementing custom integration connector. Serveral members have to be implemented in order to achieve desired functionality.

member.name: F:CMS.SynchronizationEngine.BaseIntegrationConnector.internalTranslations
member.summary: ID translation table [className.ToLower()] -> Hashtable [OldID -> NewID]

member.name: F:CMS.SynchronizationEngine.BaseIntegrationConnector.externalTranslations
member.summary: ID translation table [className.ToLower()] -> Hashtable [ID -> "codename|sitename|parentid"]

member.name: P:CMS.SynchronizationEngine.BaseIntegrationConnector.ClearTranslationsAfterProcessing
member.summary: Says whether to clear cached translation information (true by default). Applies both to internal and external tasks. If switched to false, translations can still be cleared by calling ClearInternalTranslations() or ClearExternalTranslations().

member.summary: Class representing subscription to documents or objects

member.name: M:CMS.Synchronization.BaseIntegrationSubscription.#ctor(System.String,CMS.SynchronizationEngine.TaskProcessTypeEnum,CMS.SettingsProvider.TaskTypeEnum,System.String)
member.summary: Default constructor
member.param: Name of connector the subscription is attached to
Type of task which to subscribe to
Name of site which to subscribe to (accepts '%' as a wildcard representing 0-n characters)

member.name: M:CMS.Synchronization.BaseIntegrationSubscription.IsMatch(CMS.SettingsProvider.ICMSObject,CMS.SettingsProvider.TaskTypeEnum,CMS.SynchronizationEngine.TaskProcessTypeEnum@)
member.summary: Determines whether given CMS object and task type match the subscription. This method recognizes TreeNode and GeneralizedInfo as the CMS object.
member.returns: TRUE if the CMS object and task correspond with subscription settings

member.name: M:CMS.Synchronization.BaseIntegrationSubscription.IsMatch(CMS.SettingsProvider.GeneralizedInfo,CMS.SettingsProvider.TaskTypeEnum,CMS.SynchronizationEngine.TaskProcessTypeEnum@)
member.summary: Determines whether given info object and task type match the subscription
member.returns: TRUE if the info object and task correspond with subscription settings

member.name: M:CMS.Synchronization.BaseIntegrationSubscription.IsMatch(CMS.TreeEngine.TreeNode,CMS.SettingsProvider.TaskTypeEnum,CMS.SynchronizationEngine.TaskProcessTypeEnum@)
member.summary: Determines whether given node and task type match the subscription
member.returns: TRUE if the node and task correspond with subscription settings

member.name: M:CMS.Synchronization.BaseIntegrationSubscription.IsMatch(CMS.SettingsProvider.TaskTypeEnum,CMS.SynchronizationEngine.TaskProcessTypeEnum@)
member.summary: Determines whether given task type matches the TaskType property
member.returns: TRUE if task type is equal to TaskType property

member.name: M:CMS.Synchronization.BaseIntegrationSubscription.IsMatch(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether given site name matches the SiteName property
member.returns: TRUE if site name matches SiteName property

member.name: M:CMS.Synchronization.BaseIntegrationSubscription.GetRegex(System.String)
member.summary: Returns regular expression with pattern used to match words like 'cms.%' or 'cms.pagetemplate%' where '%' represents with 0-n characters
member.param: User-friendly expression to transformate to regular expression

member.name: P:CMS.Synchronization.BaseIntegrationSubscription.TaskProcessType
member.summary: Type of task processing (sync/async etc.)

member.name: P:CMS.Synchronization.BaseIntegrationSubscription.TaskType
member.summary: Task type of document or object to match.

member.name: P:CMS.Synchronization.BaseIntegrationSubscription.SiteName
member.summary: Site name of document or object to match. Use AbstractIntegrationSubscription.GLOBAL_OBJECTS to match only global objects.

member.name: P:CMS.Synchronization.BaseIntegrationSubscription.ConnectorName
member.summary: Name of connector the subscription is attached to.

member.summary: Default constructor

Type of task processing (supported: AsyncSimple, AsyncSimpleSnapshot, SyncSnapshot)

Name of site which to subscribe to (accepts '%' as a wildcard representing 0-n characters)
Node alias path of document which to subscribe to (accepts '%' as a wildcard representing 0-n characters)
Culture code of document which to subscribe to (accepts '%' as a wildcard representing 0-n characters)
Class name of document which to subscribe to (accepts '%' as a wildcard representing 0-n characters)

member.returns: TRUE if the node and task correspond with subscription settings

member.summary: Culture code of document to match
